location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William [Calcutta]

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding accounts with vouchers (not present) for the month of December 1807. It further explains that an additional charge has been made to the account due to the cost of staff wages. The circumstances as to why this situation has arisen are outlined and the reasons behind why the Resident feels that it is justified.
